titleStmt.title: [A true report of the late horrible murther committed by VVilliam Sherwood prisoner in the Queenes Benche, for the profession of Popery, the 18. of Iune. 1581.]

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Charlewood and Edvvard VVhite,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title; imprint from colophon.
Imperfect; as filmed title page too dark to read.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
